hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Deku Shield#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Red Potion Bottle# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #the Song of Time#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Huge Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Anything not saved will be lost.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# a melody and boulders conceal...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #Skulls#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #the hero#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #4# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Lab).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #4# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #Skulls#.
